issue.title: [CF 49] Tellmewhen does not show on UI after addon update.
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.98, Microsoft Windows NT 6.0.6002 Service Pack 2

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 2.0.0 beta8

Description

Recent addon update caused addon to stop showing on UI. Worked fine before i updated the addons via curse client. Now, no timers show on my UI.

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 4.0.0.5 Ace2 - r1101 Addon Control Panel - 3.3.9 Altoholic - Altoholic 4.0.003 Atlas - Atlas v1.17.2 Atlasloot Enhanced - v5.11.07 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.9.4961 BadKitty - BadKitty 2.0.3 BankItems - v40000 Bartender4 - 4.4.14 ButtonFacade - 4.0.340 ClassTimer - 2.3.40000.4 Clique - v40000-1.2.11 CowTip - v1.3.2 CurseProfiler 2.0 - v47 DBMFTLBBQ - r43 DBM-SpellTimers (Deadly Boss Mods) - DBM-SpellTimers r64 Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.64-r4605 Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker - Deadly Boss Mods - LibDataBroker 4.10-r9 Deadly Boss Mods - Vanilla and BC mods - DBM - Burning Crusade Mods 4.04-r18 Decursive - 2.5.2.2-18-ge6f95ee EquipCompare - 2.18 Gatherer - Gatherer 3.1.16 GathererDB WoWHead - 2009.09.12 GatherMate - v.1.25 GearScore - GearScore 3.1.20b - Release Grid - 1.40000.1370 GridManaBars - v1.03 HealBot Continued - 4.0.3.0 IceHUD - 1.7.3.8 kNamePlates - r21-beta LightHeaded - r315 LuckyCharms2 - LuckyCharms2 v2.8.2 Mappy - 3.0.1 Mapster - 1.3.11 Moncai Compare - v1.4 Omen Threat Meter - v3.0.11-2-g7c2d8db OmniCC - 4.0.waffles6 oRA2 - r673-release oUF - 1.5.4 Power Auras Classic - 4.6 Proximo - v2.321 Quartz - 3.0.4 RareFinder - v0.7b RatingBuster - 1.6.2 Recount - v4.0.1d release RecountDeathTrack - v4.0.1 release RecountFailBot - v3.1e stable Rise of Honor - Raid Mods Routes - v1.3.0 Sell-O-Matic - v1.2.9a ShockAndAwe - v6.11 Squawk And Awe - v1.6.0 TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 2.0.0 beta8 Titan Panel - 5.0.0.40000 TitanBankItems - 1.2 TomTom - v40000-1.0.1 TomTomTargetArrow - r16 TourGuide - 4.0.0.57-Beta WIM (WoW Instant Messenger) v3 - 3.4.2 X-Perl UnitFrames - 3.1.1 Release


> Posted by CurseForge user Dirkfett | Imported from CurseForge issue #49 | Raw

comments.body:
I am going to assume you are not using an error catching addon. Release is coming today and all settings will be re-upgraded. I was kinda dumb and didnt create new upgrades for each new beta version.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
